alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 11:52AM EDT until April 10 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale. .Lowland, minor flooding continues along lower portions of the East Fork of the White River. With dry weather expected into the upcoming week, flooding is expected to end by Tuesday afternoon at Rivervale. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Rivervale. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Lawrenceport Road just east of Lawrenceport and on the south side of river begins to flood around this level. During typical floods in this area this portion of the road can be flooded by 5 to more than 10 feet of water. During the January 2005 flood this area would have been near the "bottom" of the river, underwater by nearly 17 feet. In the Great March 1913 flood, more than 25 feet of water would have covered this location. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 20.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EDT Sunday was 20.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.4 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
